project.description:
Not reporting to treeherder prod.
Just testing https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cht9Xq9suGg This 20-minute video causes failures due to a premature TimeoutException. The video has ad breaks at the very beginning, at the 10-minute mark and at the very end. `wait_for_almost_done` used in test_video_playing_in_one_tab tends to exit during the mid-point ad. This was intermittent at first, but become much more frequent after the 'new MSE' implementation became default in Nightly 42. The video is also associated with a lot of lag - 39s.

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: c:\mozilla-build\msys\bin\bash -xe -c "export PATH=$MOZBUILDPATH; URL_FILE=/c/Windows/Temp/minecraft.ini; echo '[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cht9Xq9suGg]' > $URL_FILE; python ./run_media_tests.py --installer-url http://pf-jenkins.qa.mtv2.mozilla.com:8080/job/firefox-nightly-win32/ws/releases/firefox-latest-nightly.en-US.win32.zip --symbols-url http://pf-jenkins.qa.mtv2.mozilla.com:8080/job/symbols-nightly-win32/ws/releases/firefox-latest-nightly.en-US.win32.crashreporter-symbols.zip --test-timeout 2435 --media-urls $URL_FILE -c config/treeherder_submission.py --log-level=debug --job-name='MSE YouTube Playback Medium1 60min' --job-symbol=ym1-60 --tests ./firefox_media_tests/playback/youtube/manifest.ini --treeherder-url='https://treeherder.allizom.org/' --treeherder-credentials=$TREEHERDER_CONFIG/treeherder-staging-credentials.json --s3-credentials=$TREEHERDER_CONFIG/s3-credentials.json; if [ $(grep --count 'Marionette: success' logs/log_info.log) -eq "0" ]; then exit 1; fi"
